title: Sixth rebalancing of the $SCIFI Index, June 2021
body:
The voting for the sixth rebalancing of the $SCIFI Index has now started

**What?**

Mission Control presents the list of potential new assets to remove and include in the SCIFI index token for the June 2021 rebalancing.

**Why?**

The SCIFI Index is an actively curated index, rebalanced on a monthly schedule. By opening the rebalancing decision to the DAO we are keeping in line with the core value proposition of the SCIFI index and following its methodology.

**How?**

Mission Control will suggest two tokens to be removed and 8 potential additions to the index. The 10 assets will include the two tokens that Mission Control suggests removing, so that the DAO may choose to keep them in after all. The two assets with the most votes will be included. The rebalancing will be implemented on the first weekday after the 19th of the month.
author: 0x954689C01A01d3F776eB69B753C084e526812f8d
